name: happybirthdayinmanylanguages
0:
”Alexa, open birthday wisher”
”Play birthday song in Punjabi”
”Alexa, Ask birthday wisher, play birthday song in Tamil”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: birthday wisher
des: Enable alexa skill "Birthday wisher" and wish your friends and family in different languages like Hindi, Tamil, Punjabi, Bhojpuri, English. You can ask "Alexa ask birthday wisher, wish shashank in Bhojpuri" and place a phone call or video call to enjoy the birthday wish with your friend. Many more languages to be added soon. Watch out the space.Alexa, open birthday wisher
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
